website_summaries.verdict: The Verizon Wireless Motorola Droid Razr Maxx HD provides plenty of power and enough battery life to keep you going all day.
pros: Solid build quality.Fast processor and data speeds

customer_reviews.title: Lots of promise but fails to deliver over the long haul
customer_reviews.text: My Motorola Droid RAZR MAXX HD had great battery life (up to 4 days of light use) when I purchased it which decreased rapidly over time to the point that even with moderate use the battery couldn't make it through the day. Then after about a year the camera started malfunctioning ("Camera Can Not Initialize") and a month or so after that it just started rebooting itself randomly (even in the middle of phone calls). I purchased this phone based on good reviews and the claims of good battery life. I'm not even at the 2 year mark and the phone is almost worthless. I won't be buying a Motorola phone again any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Used this phone for years
customer_reviews.text: I used this phone for years. I dropped it in water about 4 times before the speaker went out. Other than that, it still worked! I never used a screen protector and it doesn't have deep scratches or cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Microphone issues!
customer_reviews.text: This made my third Droid Razr Maxx phone.....out of the box it had a purple tint to the screen and I was having trouble with the microphone. I bought another Droid razr maxx(my 4th) and out of the box the microphone didn't work at all. Returned both of the phones and purchased another Droid razr maxx(my 5th droid razr maxx) and it too has microphone issues. There must have been a batch of phones from the factory with bad microphones and thats what the suppliers on amazon currently have. I love the Droid razr maxx but I may have to switch to a different phone if the basic features don't work.
customer_reviews.author: NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had Droids before and was looking at the I phone and I am glad I bought this instead.My daughters have I phones and they never seem to keep charged, drop service alot too. Not the Droid. This phone stays charged all day and even over night. I work in a hair salon and have forgotten to take my carger and it lasted all day with clients calling. I was a little worried about the not being able to remove the battery but so for it has not been a problem. Great phone
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Droid Razr Maxx HD - good replacement for my wife's Droid X
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for my wife's Droid X. Originally planned on getting 2, but Amazon was short on stock at the time, and we could only order 1. My wife likes it, is happy with the features, speed, camera, durability, just about everything. Only issue.... It requires periodic hard boots (using the power and volume down keys - hence it lost a star). No rhyme nor reason for us to track this issue. She says the phone has way more capability than she has the time to learn to use properly, but that was the same for her Droid X.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty's Friend

customer_reviews.title: Battery Great, Phone OK
customer_reviews.text: Battery life great, phone not as nice as other top manufacturer models. If you need a long battery than this one will not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I'd be lost without it
customer_reviews.text: I lOVE this phone. The battery life is unbelievable!!! The battery lasts me all day even using the internet, playing Candy Crush Saga and talking on the phone. Screen resolution is beautiful very clear. I lost my original Droid Razr Maxx (the one before the maxx HD) and couldn't find another one, so I got this one and I'm glad I did. I would recommend this phone to anyone who uses their smartphone a lot and doesn't want to charge their phone constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Great phone so far!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Iphone 4 before this one and loved it. When it was time for upgrading I knew I would get the Iphone 5. But I was so disappointed at the size of the new screen...so I started looking at competitors. Decided on the Motorola based on past experience with Motorola phones. I LOVE it! Got a little discouraged the first week or so adjusting to a new operating system but I got over that quickly. I love the large bright display, the extended battery life and now I even love Android!
customer_reviews.author: Bamabooma

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life, Great Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Not much more to say other than the subject line. I was coming over from a Samsung Stratosphere that I loved due to the slide out keyboard, and now I don't miss it at all. The bigger screen and voice recognition made up the difference, not to mention the ridiculously better battery life that this phone is known for. You won't regret getting this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kremen

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The battery life sold me on this purchase and it's been great. Only heavy use of games will drain it in a day. You can go 2 days without charging if you are a light user. I went from an Incredible to this, so the bigger screen is great. Anything bigger and it wouldn't have fit in my pocket. All of the phone memory is available for apps, which was a huge problem in older phones where app memory was smaller. Going to Jelly Bean was a great upgrade, too. I didn't realize all of the cool things I had been missing out on.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone in the Game
customer_reviews.text: You're overcompensating if you need a more powerful phone than this. This has everything anyone could need for any phone application and packs the battery that easily lasts me two days along with kevlar back, gorilla glass, and nanoparticle circuitry protection coating. Pros: Everything else Cons: Camera is terrible in low light as expected and also has difficulty focusing in general.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Myers

customer_reviews.title: When I bought this they said everything worked fine just a few minor scratches
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this they said everything worked fine just a few minor scratches. Everything does work there wasn't any scratches, but the mic doesn't work which makes it a hassle when in trying to call somone or they're calling me I have to have either my ear buds with a mic or Bluetooth in order for them to hear me. Wishing I would have done a bit more research before getting it. Other than the mic it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: The phone has lots of functions and the batter far outlasts my others. The processor is a bit slow. When having several apps open at once, the phone can become a bit sluggish. However the functionality and battery outweighs the cons for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone but I noticed that the home toolbar was burned in on the screen along with the keyboard. It is not that big a deal but it did kind of bother me when I put the screen into landscape but other than that it is an excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: Battery is almost too good to be true...
customer_reviews.text: I already loved the Motorola Razr but in the 16GB version, battery life was a problem for me. I USE my phone A LOT Every Day and I still can't run the battery to zero in a 12 hour day and if I use it less, I get 16 - 20 hours. Phenominal...
customer_reviews.author: stevescollectibles.net

customer_reviews.title: More then a phone
customer_reviews.text: The kids aren't the only ones who no how to use this technical product. The camera is good hd quality, this is a computer as well I have only had the phone for a short time but everyday I find new uses, this is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice battery.
customer_reviews.text: Going on a little over a month. Battery running about 50 hours per charge. Syncing things on the hour to cut down the chatter. The darker the wallpaper the better. HDMI to he big screen is pretty sweet too. I'm still looking for a nice multimedia dock.
customer_reviews.author: ddegreg

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever. BUT - If you live outside the USA, you have to root this phone to get past the battery draining Fast modem dormancy issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Birch

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, good size.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Good update cycle from Motorola so far, and my phone has not sustained any major damage despite the amount of wear and tear I have put it through. I love the solid and strong feel to the phone, with sturdy materials apparently used throughout. The size is just perfect for me as well. A little bigger than an iphone but not monstrous like some phones. Nice middle ground.
customer_reviews.author: David Gasser

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great...the 4G is super fast.....the HD OMG....I can defiantly tell the difference from my old phone the Droid 3....love...love...love my new phone
customer_reviews.author: Jeneen

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great battery, great screen.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone...replaced my HTC Incredible, and Amazon Wireless really delivered a nice unit, for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my husband because he always has issues with battery life. Now, I'm kinda of jealous...I think I like it better than my Samsung SIII!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing phone. Extremely satisfied with the battery life! Highly recommend this to anyone who uses their phone a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thompson

customer_reviews.title: very happy with moto rzr maxx hd
customer_reviews.text: Came in better than described condition. Phone is flawless cosmetically and seems to operate without any problems. Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Droid Razar Max
customer_reviews.text: My wife birthday present she loves it and the battery life is fantastic two days and she plays a lot of games
customer_reviews.author: Norman Wellerman

customer_reviews.title: Tech Junk -don't before reading.
customer_reviews.text: I can see the main screen bleeding through the the entire phone, no matter what app, picture, or video is playing. Caller I'd is a joke, it processor is so slow it takes 3 rings before it recognizes your contact. Freezes so much, restarting 3 or 4 times dailey. This phone takes patience not to throw it against the nearest wall, let alone to rely on it for daily communication. Oh, and don't try to pinch it on your shoulder and talk, the antenna sticks and no one can hear you..I am going to return this back to amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Battery!
customer_reviews.text: You won't believe this is a smartphone. The battery can last for more than a two days!! Carrying my charger with me is in the past!!
customer_reviews.author: moonsbabe

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Came in looking brand new, no problems hooking up to service. Great phone for the price, very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: xxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery is the best, apps runs smooth, Camera is OK but takes some time to focus at times, I did not like what Verizon did to stock gallery app (it uses Verizon's cloud instead of Google's cloud). Everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: More than meets my expectations. Processor is very fast and 4g speed is fantastic. The toughness is great. I've dropped it a few times, before I got my otter box case, and no scratches on the glass. Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for a good price. No problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: it won't play videos right it looks like they are scramble
customer_reviews.text: Well from the day I got it ...it won't play videos right it looks like they are scramble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Razr Maxx HD
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my phone or the whole Amazon.com experience! It was so easy and the site walked me through each step of the process. I will definitely be getting my next phone through Amazon. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: imajn1

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love my new phone. The battery life is a great improvement from my Samsung Charge (POS phone). Highly recommend this phone. Downside, is trying to find a decent case. I am too cheap to buy an Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad phone
customer_reviews.text: Not a great phone I had two and both times the operating system crashed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris stuart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was fantastic good product and delivery was on time appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: habeeb mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Thee best!
customer_reviews.text: Had the razr maxx but this phone is great! Best phone by far and way better than Galaxy! Battery life is great, still needs charge if using frequently.
customer_reviews.author: nickro

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved every bit of my new phone. A very nice phone with a superb battery life. It also has a great screen and the camera is quite decent. Overall, a very nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Suddhasattwa Brahma

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied. it is a very good phone and in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied.it is a very good phone and in better condition than they said.
customer_reviews.author: Charles smith

customer_reviews.title: BUT, there is no reason why a brand new phone should do random reboot on several times a day.
customer_reviews.text: There better be a fix for this very soon. Android: 4.1.2 Verizon I got it for the batterylife and sturdyness.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kloster

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This refurbished phone is horrible. I have problems with it constantly. I want to send it back asap.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone! I have had it for over a month now and have no complaints what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wont Charge
customer_reviews.text: Great phone runs everything super-fast and pretty only problem is that the only place I can charge it is VIA usb plugged into my PC, it will not charge on a wall plug, I have tried a dozen different cables from different manufactures even the one out of the box with the brand new phone and it will not charge on the wall plug but will charge just fine if I take that same cable and plug it into my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies easily,had to get a Sim Card,not any space
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: It already broke.
customer_reviews.text: I had the phone for three weeks. It was on the armrest of the couch, fell off and the screen shattered. It was also in an otterbox case.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got the phone in the mail today as it said it would be here. Few dings and paint chips but I got a little better quality than I thought I would for what I paid so I cannot complain! Have not activated it yet through carrier, hopefully that is a breeze! As far as phone condition it was pretty decent and would buy from this seller again if in a bind like I am now! No scratches on screen. Only the small blemishes that can be covered up by a phone case anyway!
customer_reviews.author: DKnip

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it for the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a Samsung Charge Droid. I had no complaints other than the battery life was very poor. I have tested the RAZR MAXX HD doing GPS for 2 hours and 2 hours using the phone as a Hot Spot Internet connection before it ran low on battery power. Much superior compared to previous phone. I have little doubt the phone will run out of power when receiving GPS directions when plugged into 12 Volt power in a vehicle as the Charge phone did.
customer_reviews.author: KEN from Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Razr Max HD
customer_reviews.text: My Razr Max HD arrived with Jelly Bean preinstalled. I have not experienced any of the problems many have experienced with the OS upgrade. This is a great phone! Much smarter than I am, more functionality than I will ever need or understand. Battery life is as advertised, call quality is exceptional, and 4G connectivity is lightning fast. Feels good and looks good. I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: jbrnigan

customer_reviews.title: Phone Arrived In Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset about this phone I purchased. When it arrived, the back cover was detached from the phone and it appears that someone had tried to glue it previously. So I have to hold the pieces together while I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Openshaw

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for a Droid X
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, but you have to be careful of the apps that you download. I ate through my data very quickly and had to find out how I had done this. The phone shows you exactly what apps ate what data. After adjustments (and deletions), I have it under control. I use the phone as my GPS, and the docking stations works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Douglas Levens

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Still getting familiar with it. Occasionally locks up, but pressing simultaneously on the Power and Volume buttons for several seconds fixes that. Able to quickly get GPS location when not connected to cell network. Big disadvantage so far is inability to store maps on external SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Mick

customer_reviews.title: Motorola droid razr maxx Hd
customer_reviews.text: love everything about this phone, I have an anroid answering machine which is just the best possible thing.lets you know you have an incoming call, talks to you you can talk to it, just love this pone....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Days Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This phone can last two full days without charging. I am an average user, not watching movies on it but conversations with friends via text. The phone feels solid, durable in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: HappyElephant

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying My New Smart Phone
customer_reviews.text: Am enjoying all the features on this smart phone. Has a long battery life. Happy with Verizon 4G. Still learning all I can do with this phone. Have only had the phone for a couple of weeks but pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is outstanding. Excellent upgrade for the Droid Razr. Easy to set-up and transfer contacts and apps. Fast touch response and excellent screen clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne G.

customer_reviews.title: Loving It!
customer_reviews.text: About a week after I bought it (July 2013), Verizon said they "retired" the phone. Love the phone and wish it had been available for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: tjones

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for almost two years now. Battery life is still excellent and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L.

customer_reviews.title: droid maxx
customer_reviews.text: this phone was a steal on amazon,its a nice phone with great battery life,and a lot of features included I like it a lot thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Don R

customer_reviews.title: First smart phone
customer_reviews.text: After looking for this particular phone at stores, I was thrilled to find it at Amazon for an amazing price. So, I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Love long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an HTC Evo which did not last the day when using throughout the day. The Razr Maxx battery life is outstanding; goes several days without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, large screen, great pictures, strong build. Love the virtual buttons which go away when watching a video. Nothing negative yet.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Motorola DROID RAZR HD
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade to my previous droid 3g. It is a very fast 4g, with a longer battery life. It is a great phone and the price was awesome. Super instructions on the "how to process". Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for a better phone. The display is great, functionality is awesome, service is good. Basically tops any other phone that I have seen to date. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moser

customer_reviews.title: this phone keeps turning off
customer_reviews.text: i charged this phone completely and it just turned itself off. then i read online reviews about what others had done and they said to push the power and volume down buttons for a long time to turn it back on. it does this nonsense once a day and i've had it almost a month. totally unreliable phone we're going to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Motorola DROID RAZR MAXX HD (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description: The Motorola Droid RAZR MAXX HD is a variant of the RAZR HD adding a larger battery for over 24-hour battery life, and 32GB internal storage. This device offers a 4.7-inch HD Super AMOLED screen, 1.5 GHz dual-core processor, 1GB RAM, and is ready to multitask games, photos, music, videos, apps and more seamlessly. The Droid RAZR MAXX HD is also equipped with 4G LTE data, WiFi, NFC, and quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use. Access thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars219 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
